sentences.english: Crawfish, like shrimp or lobsters, belong to the scientific class Crustacea.
sentences.chinese: 小龍蝦和蝦或龍蝦一樣，在科學上屬於甲殼綱動物。

sentences.english: That braised lobster is just delicious.
sentences.chinese: 那道紅燒小龍蝦真的太好吃了。

sentences.english: Crawfish, like shrimp or lobsters, belong to the scientific Crustacea.
sentences.chinese: 小龍蝦和蝦或龍蝦一樣，在科學上屬於甲殼綱動物。

sentences.english: At lunch next day there were very nice pies, crayfish, mutton cutlets ;
sentences.chinese: 第二天的午飯是非常美味的餡餅，小龍蝦和羊肉片。

sentences.english: "We are looking at trying to extend the crawfish season, " he said.
sentences.chinese: 我們正在努力延長這種小龍蝦的生長季節。

sentences.english: At lunch next day there were very nice pies, crayfish, and mutton cutlets ;
sentences.chinese: 第二天的午飯是非常美味的餡餅，小龍蝦和羊肉片。

sentences.english: Cool the langoustines quickly, then chop the flesh.
sentences.chinese: 撈出小龍蝦迅速冷卻，然後將蝦肉剁碎。

sentences.english: A crayfish that loses a leg simply grows a new one.
sentences.chinese: 小龍蝦失去一條腿，就再長出一條。

sentences.english: Early summer is the best time for eating crayfish.
sentences.chinese: 而初夏就是品嚐小龍蝦的最佳時間。

sentences.english: This is where the infected crayfish will get "stuck" in a moult.
sentences.chinese: 這是在受感染的小龍蝦將獲得“停留在蛻皮”。

sentences.english: Jambalaya and a crawfish pie and fillet gumbo.
sentences.chinese: 什錦菜，小龍蝦派，秋葵加肉片。

sentences.english: "This is that alternative species of crawfish, " said Lutz.
sentences.chinese: 這是小龍蝦的替代品種。

sentences.english: This year the numbers of small lobsters are dropping.
sentences.chinese: 這年，小龍蝦的數量減少了。

sentences.english: Jambalaya, craw- fish pie, fillet gumbo.
sentences.chinese: 什錦菜，小龍蝦派，和魚片濃湯。

sentences.english: Here we add cut zanders and crawfish meet.
sentences.chinese: 然後加入切碎的梭鱸和小龍蝦。

sentences.english: Light Soup with Trout, Catfish, Crawfish, Monkfish and Garlic Bread.
sentences.chinese: 海鮮湯配鱒魚，鮎魚，安康魚和小龍蝦及蒜蓉麪包。

definition: umami, one of the five basic tastes (cookery)
